content.title: Vietopik - Funda isiKorea mahhala
content.learnKorean: Funda isiKorea ngezifundo ezisezingeni eliphakeme kusuka kochwepheshe azikho.
content.learnFromExperts: Funda ezikhulumeni zomdabu kanye nothisha abanolwazi.
content.learnAtYourOwnPace: Funda ngejubane lakho ngokufinyelela okungenamkhawulo ezifundweni.
content.coverAllAspects: Ukusuka ekuqaleni kuya emazingeni athuthukile, ukumboza uhlelo lolimi, ulwazimagama, kanye nengxoxo.

testimonial1.quote: "IVietopik yangisiza ngilungiselele ukuhlolwa kwe-topik yami ngempumelelo. Izifundo zihlelwe kahle futhi kulula ukuzilandela!"
testimonial1.name: Nguyen Minh anh

testimonial2.quote: "Ukufunda Korea akukaze kube lula! Izifundo ezihlelekile zenza konke kube lula futhi kube mnandi."
testimonial2.name: Tran Hai Nam

testimonial3.quote: "Ngenxa yeVietopik, amakhono ami okulalela nokukhuluma athuthuke kakhulu ezinyangeni ezintathu nje!"
testimonial3.name: ULe Thanh Huong

content.yourOneStopShop: Ipulatifomu yakho eyodwa yokumisa kahle i-KORAN. Finyelela izinsiza ze-premium mahhala futhi uzuze izinhloso zakho zolimi namuhla!

metadata.lesson: Dlulisa amehlo ezifundweni zethu zakamuva futhi uthole okuthile ozokuthanda.
